Description: Calcite shabti with black painted detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features and crossed arms; two blank columns for text down the leg section.
Bibliographic references: Adams 1977 / Egyptian objects in the Victoria and Albert Museum (p.43)
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum (Department of Architecture and Sculpture)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
